## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G30750](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G30750)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CYP71A12</u>
- **Gene Name:** cytochrome P450, family 71, subfamily A, polypeptide 12
- **Description:**   cytochrome P450 family 71 polypeptide;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT2G30750.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT2G30750.1)
## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0009029](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0009029)&nbsp;---&nbsp;stamen&nbsp;---&nbsp;estambre (Spanish, exact), 雄蕊 (Japanese, exact), Poaceae stamen (narrow), Zea stamen (narrow)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS72340]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;reduced camalexin production
   - [GABI_127H03]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;When camalexin was determined two days after infection with <i>Pseudomonas syringae</i>, no reduction in camalexin levels relative to wild-type plants was observed.
   - [cyp71a12/cyp71a13]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;More susceptible to P. syringae compared to mature wildtype plants displaying age-related resistance; infiltration of exogenous DHCA enhanced resistance in mature.

   - [stamen](/tags/stamen/)
